channel.title: Spell require infinity equipted to use ? how
channel.description:
Ok, so iv got a full set of all custom spell i made (:D) and i would like to know to make it so u need to have like full infinity on to use the spell
help please ;)

	        addSkillXP((100*hitDiff), playerMagic);

but again im sorry if it dosent work im not really sure if thats the correct code

item.title: Spell require infinity equipted to use ? how
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

i would of but i have no idea where to put it rofl, dont usualy bother with spells

Where would i put it in this ??

if(magicID == 12929) {// call of death if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 90) { stillgfx(579, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(576, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(573, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(572, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(88, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(498, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(280, absY, absX); stillgfx(180, absY, absX); stillgfx(84, absY, absX); stillgfx(436, absY, absX); hitDiff = 90 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((100*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(1972); } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

or would i put it in 1 of the other ancients codes :S

Read full topic
